title: I found away to fix the LeaverBuster chain!
body: Do you have that LeaverBuster problem whenever the timer hits 0 and it refreshes, you can fix this by joining a pre-made lobby with a friend or more and waiting it out.

replies.body: Dude I have tried it. It doesn't work at all.
I'm about 99% sure that your theory of this leavebuster Q stuff.... is just all in your head.
